pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Amulet LevelDBA Cython wrapper for Mojang's modified LevelDB library.## Install`pip install amulet-leveldb`## Use```pyfrom leveldb import LevelDBcreate_if_missing = True # optional input. Default False.db = LevelDB("path/to/db", create_if_missing)db.put(b"key", b"value")print(db.get(b"key"))# b"value"```See the [source code](src/leveldb/_leveldb.pyx) for full documentation.
